query:
SELECT
                t.id,
                t.slug,
                t.name,
                t.pinned,
                COUNT(p.id) AS "count!"
            FROM tags t
            LEFT JOIN post_tags pt ON pt.tag_id = t.id
            LEFT JOIN posts p
                ON p.id = pt.post_id
                AND p.status = 'published'
                AND p.published_at IS NOT NULL
            GROUP BY t.id, t.slug, t.name, t.pinned
            ORDER BY t.pinned DESC, LOWER(t.name), t.slug
